name: Roll With The Punches
description:
You're a few weeks out from a major prizefight... but you're looking more like a gumdrop than a boxer. Thankfully, you still have that gym subscription you've been meaning to use. Together, you and your handy dice will construct a regimen to get you fit in no time... but skipping leg day may have its consequences.

HOW TO PLAY:
  • Assemble a weekly workout plan by rolling dice!
    • Balance your gains between arms, legs, and torso -- but don't forget your cardio (heart.)
    • Click dice to lock them -- then, they won't change when you roll.
    • Try out your new bod in between weeks.
  • After three weeks of training, put your skills to the test in an epic prizefight.
    • Use W and S to shift your stance up and down.
    • Punch with P and kick with K.
    • Fitness ain't everything. Match your opponent's stance and block their attacks.

The DeliveryBot team:

  • Ben Sulzinsky: original artwork, programming
  • Josh Gardos: programming, original music, bass

Special thanks to Jason Bangser for sitting in on guitar!

Made in 1 weekend for the GTMK Game Jam 2022.
